The sole advantage of the super kebab is that, unlike the normal kebab, the super kebab has a 5/8 chance to increase Hitpoints by 3 + 7% of the player's Hitpoints level.[1]. It also has a 1/32 chance of reducing any stats minus Hitpoints.

Item ID4608

A super kebab is a kebab that has had red hot sauce added to make it spicy. They are sold by Ali the Kebab seller for 5 coins. The sole advantage of the super kebab is that, unlike the normal kebab, the super kebab has a 5/8 chance to increase Hitpoints by 3 + 7% of the player's Hitpoints level.[1]. It also has a 1/32 chance of reducing any stats minus Hitpoints.

To make a super kebab, the player must use red hot sauce (obtained from Ali the Kebab seller) on either a normal kebab or ugthanki kebab. The smelling ugthanki kebab will also work.

[[File:Super kebab detail.png|left|190px]]
A '''super kebab''' is a [[kebab]] that has had [[red hot sauce]] added to make it spicy. They are sold by [[Ali the Kebab seller]] for 5 [[coins]]. The sole advantage of the super kebab is that, unlike the normal [[kebab]], the super kebab has a 5/8 chance to increase [[Hitpoints]] by 3 + 7% of the player's Hitpoints level.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1163124144902496256|date=18 August 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/VsBsr|archivedate=30 May 2020|quote=5/8 chance of it buffing HP by 3-plus-7%.
1/32 chance of it reducing any stat except HP, with equal chances.}}. It also has a 1/32 chance of reducing any stats minus [[Hitpoints]].

To make a super kebab, the player must use [[red hot sauce]] (obtained from [[Ali the Kebab seller]]) on either a normal [[kebab]] or [[ugthanki kebab]]. The [[Ugthanki kebab (smelling)|smelling]] ugthanki kebab will also work.
